channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pentagon Acquires Combat Proven ‘Multi-Dimensional Drone Swarm’
item.description: Under a new contract the Pentagon will acquire drones with sophisticated swarming capability incorporating lessons learned from intense drone warfare ...

item.title: Sandisk Announces The Launch Of The World’s Smallest 1TB USB-C Flash Drive
item.description: This new and compact Sandisk Extreme Fit USB-C flash drive is being billed as the world’s smallest 1TB USB-C flash drive amd is designed for today's s...

item.title: Australian AI Technology Could Revolutionize Lunar Surface Exploration
item.description: AI-enabled mapping will pave the way for extremely precise lunar surveys. The tech could help pinpoint both new science targets and resources for futu...

item.title: Will The Steam Machine Be Your Next Gaming PC... Or Console?
item.description: Valve's new Steam Machine is a smart little gaming PC that looks at home on a desk or under the TV. Could it pose a threat to games consoles too?

item.title: Europe’s Deforestation Deadlock Puts Business Credibility On The Line
item.description: Europe’s delay on its deforestation law risks new ESG liabilities as Borneo timber enters EU supply chains, testing traceability and credibility.

item.title: Stuck happens

item.title: The pursuit of wonder
